#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
    int t,n,m;
    scanf("%d",&t);

    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%d%d",&n,&m);

        if(n%2!=0 && m>=n)
        printf("R\n");
        else if(n%2==0 && m>=n)
        printf("L\n");
        else if(n%2!=0 && m<n && m%2!=0 || n%2==0 && m<n && m%2!=0)
        printf("D\n");
        else if(n%2!=0 && m<n && m%2==0 || n%2==0 && m<n && m%2==0)
        printf("U\n");
    }
}
